Bash("C:\\Users\\Kamalesh\\firwatch-tools\\_extract_pdf.py" << 'PYEOF'
import pdfplumber
import os

base = r"C:\\Users\\Kamalesh\\firwatch-tools"

for fname in ["statement_month_1.pdf", "statement_month_6.pdf"]:
    path = os.path.join\(base, fname\)
    print\("=" * 80\)
    print\(f"FILE: {fname}"\)
    print\("=" * 80\)
    with pdfplumber.open\(path\) as pdf:
        for i, page in enumerate\(pdf.pages\):
            text = page.extract_text\(\)
            print\(f"--- Page {i+1} ---"\)
            print\(text\)
            print\(\)
    print\(\)
PYEOF)
